1.0.1.name: connect20/Eadesigndev_Ifmobile
1.0.1.description: The extension will add the possibility to check if the browsing is done from mobile devices. Also if you enable and add the fields in the system/configuration you will be able to separate ski css/js.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
